title: Thomas Tuchel - Wikipedia
snippet: On 24 March 2023, Tuchel was announced as head coach at Bayern Munich on a two-year deal, replacing his former player Julian Nagelsmann, who was dismissed. Tuchel was presented at a club press conference the following day, where he said "the squad assembled [here] is one of the most talented ...

title: Thomas Tuchel: News & profile - FC Bayern München
snippet: Thomas Tuchel (born 29 August 1973) has been the coach of FC Bayern since 24 March 2023. Info, titles & news - you can find everything here!

title: Introducing new Bayern boss Thomas Tuchel
snippet: Thomas Tuchel has been appointed FC Bayern head coach. The 49-year-old has signed a contract with the German record champions until 30 June 2025. fcbayern.com profiles the new man in the Munich dugout.

title: Thomas Tuchel's fascinating coaching journey from Mainz to England manager | Bundesliga
snippet: Thomas Tuchel spent the best part of a decade honing his craft on Bundesliga touchlines with Mainz and Borussia Dortmund, before reaching consecutive UEFA Champions League finals with Paris Saint-Germain and Chelsea.

title: Niko Kovač, Thomas Tuchel and the men who've coached Bayern Munich and Borussia Dortmund | Bundesliga
snippet: As arguably the two biggest clubs in the Bundesliga, Bayern Munich and Borussia Dortmund have attracted some of the best coaching talent Germany and the world have to offer.
